metadata.title: Friday, 15th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    whether the suspects in the murder of the following deceased persons who died in circumstances involving political violence have been arrested:
(i)    Mr Menyani Zulu who died during the Rufunsa Local Government by-election; and (ii)    Mr Johannes Liakoka and Mr Harrison Chanda who died during the Livingstone Parliamentary by-election;
(b)    which political parties the deceased persons above belonged to;
(c)    whether the deceased persons were residents of the areas in which they died, and, if not, where they resided;
(d)    how Mr Listead Phiri a member of the Patriotic Front, found himself in the Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency by-election violence when he is a Lusaka resident; and
(e)    what measures the Ministry is taking to ensure that political party cadres are not exported to Mansa Central Parliamentary Constituency during the by-election period.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    how many licensed mines operate in Kasempa District; and

(b)    of the licensed mines, how many are owned by indigenous Zambians.
